page.title: 16WESTMESTON VILLAGE 1
page.content: We interviewed a well-known resident of Westmeston{"MRS DORIS HALL"}who has written a local guidebook and a book about Growing-up In Neighbouring Ditchling. Westmeston Village starts at High-Park Farm and goes south to Wivelsfield in a long line.252 people live there and very few are children. We heard about the great changes in Westmeston. In the past,most{Now the villagers are of the villagers{either'commuters' to worked on the {London or Brighton or local farms. {retired residents. What is immediately noticed is the absence of shops.There has never been shops in this private village. Milk=the local farm.{Now this comes 3 Bread=Ditchling. {times a week. Doctors come from Ditchling,but the medicine has to come from Hassocks.
